products.name: Snowboard Jacket Men Burgundy
products.description: Looking for the perfect blend of a riding hoodie and a fully-featured ski jacket? We get it. You want the specs and the capability to ride everything on the mountain, but without the bulk. And that’s why we designed the Blizzard. Packed with all the essential features and tech you need to carve pistes and rip pow, this highly waterproof, lightweight pullover ski jacket is the minimalist choice for riders looking to get the maximum out of their time on the mountain. And, equipped with our bombproof 4-way stretch outer shell, it is performance and comfort personified, and a true team and rider favourite, no matter the weather.

products.name: Snowboard Boots Women Black
products.description: Conquer the slopes with confidence in our Black Snowboard Boots for women. Engineered for maximum comfort and performance, these boots provide exceptional support and traction. Whether you're carving through fresh powder or navigating challenging terrain, our boots ensure a comfortable and responsive ride. The sleek black design adds a touch of style to your winter adventures.
